attributes.action: Police to re-investigate 3 boys who sexually assaulted a 4 year old at school
attributes.additional_details:
Please click on the link for the full story or campy and paste into your browser...
https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/www.thesun.co.uk/news/2186098/boy-four-sexually-assaulted-in-his-school-toilets-by-a-gang-of-ten-year-old-lads/amp/?client=safari
attributes.background: A Boy of four was sexually assaulted in his school toilets by a gang of ten-year-old boys but police DROPPED the case because all of the pupils blamed each other for the attack and they didn't feel they had enough evidence to charge!! See The sun news for more details.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, as the investigation of specific incidents is an operational matter for the police. 

You might want to raise this issue with your elected Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC). You can find your local PCC here:

https://www.police.uk/
